id.description: The unique ID of the Concert-Band

genre.description: The music genre of the band (e.g., 'Rock', 'Metal', 'Punk') (optional)

origin_country.description: The country the band is from (optional)

rating.description: A rating for the band (e.g., a scale from 1 to 10) (optional)

link.description: A link to the Band on Plex (optional)
